content: this is a summary of a legal case that took place in the municipal court of split the case involved a dispute over the ownership rights of a coownership property the petitioner claimed ownership of a portion of the property but failed to prove it in a previous case the court held hearings and gathered evidence including expert opinions and inheritance decisions the judge made a final decision allocating a physically separated portion of the property to the petitioner and the remaining portion to the counterparty the decision was based on various articles of the property act the judge also considered the option of conducting a division of the property or selling it at a public auction and dividing the proceeds among the parties the judge calculated the costs of the proceedings and determined the fees that need to be paid
